name: Roses Are Red (Tijmen Matthys)
description:
Play as Mother Nature & fill the world with flowers in this relaxing experience.

  • Make flowers grow wherever you walk
  • Enjoy a serene experience, suited for everyone
  • Listen to the original soundtrack, featuring soprano vocals
  • Complete five areas, each with their own flower type
  • Discover the five hidden jasmine flowers

Enjoy! Feel free to leave a comment with your thoughts.

A devlog will be added later, which will show behind the scene insights on the process of creating this game. Follow & stay tuned.

My other games: https://tijmenmatthys.itch.io/
My other projects: https://tijmenmatthys.com

Concept, Art, Coding, Music - Tijmen Matthys
Vocals - Valerie De Kempe
Lyrics - Emily Dickinson (from the poem “Mother Nature”)
